tasks.label: Start Addon
tasks.command: ha addons stop "local_${input:addonName}"; ha addons start "local_${input:addonName}"; docker logs --follow "addon_local_${input:addonName}"

tasks.label: Rebuild and Start Addon
tasks.command: ha addons rebuild "local_${input:addonName}"; ha addons start "local_${input:addonName}"; docker logs --follow "addon_local_${input:addonName}"

inputs.description: Name of addon (to add your addon to this list, please edit .vscode/tasks.json)
